members.name: createdFromCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'createdFromCode_display' is added to the 'MarketingList' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'createdFromCode'
arguments.name: createdFromCode_display

constantValues: Select the type of members that this marketing list will contain: accounts, contacts, or leads. Each list can have only one member type and this value can't be changed after the marketing list is created.

members.description: Select the type of members that this marketing list will contain: accounts, contacts, or leads. Each list can have only one member type and this value can't be changed after the marketing list is created.

members.name: description

constantValues: Type additional information to describe the marketing list, such as the intended use or date of the last update.

members.description: Type additional information to describe the marketing list, such as the intended use or date of the last update.

members.name: doNotSendOnOptOut

constantValues: Select whether to override the opt-out settings on leads, contacts, and accounts for the members of the target marketing lists of the campaign activity. If No is selected, those who have chosen to opt out won't be excluded from the list. This means they will receive marketing materials.

members.description: Select whether to override the opt-out settings on leads, contacts, and accounts for the members of the target marketing lists of the campaign activity. If No is selected, those who have chosen to opt out won't be excluded from the list. This means they will receive marketing materials.

members.name: ignoreInactiveListMembers

constantValues: Select whether inactive accounts, contacts, or leads should be excluded from the campaign activity distribution when the marketing list is included in a campaign.

members.description: Select whether inactive accounts, contacts, or leads should be excluded from the campaign activity distribution when the marketing list is included in a campaign.

members.name: lastUsedOn

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the marketing list was last used in a campaign or in the creation of activities or opportunities.

members.description: Shows the date and time when the marketing list was last used in a campaign or in the creation of activities or opportunities.

members.name: lockStatus

constantValues: Select whether the marketing list is locked. If Yes is selected, no additional members can be added to the marketing list.

members.description: Select whether the marketing list is locked. If Yes is selected, no additional members can be added to the marketing list.

members.name: memberCount

constantValues: Shows the sum of all members in the marketing list.

members.description: Shows the sum of all members in the marketing list.

members.name: memberType

constantValues: Type of the members that can be stored in the marketing list.

members.description: Type of the members that can be stored in the marketing list.

members.name: purpose

constantValues: Type the intended use of the marketing list to identify its key segments, target offers, or business group.

members.description: Type the intended use of the marketing list to identify its key segments, target offers, or business group.

members.name: query

constantValues: Query used for retrieving members of marketing list.

members.description: Query used for retrieving members of marketing list.

members.name: source

constantValues: Type the source of the marketing list, such as a third-party supplier or internal database.

members.description: Type the source of the marketing list, such as a third-party supplier or internal database.

members.name: stateCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'MarketingList' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
arguments.name: stateCode_display

constantValues: Shows whether the marketing list is active or inactive. Inactive marketing lists are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

members.description: Shows whether the marketing list is active or inactive. Inactive marketing lists are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

members.name: statusCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'MarketingList' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
arguments.name: statusCode_display

members.description: Select the marketing list's status.

members.name: type

constantValues: Select whether you want the marketing list to be static or dynamic. The members in a static marketing list are unchanging. A dynamic marketing list is based on a dynamic query that retrieves the updated list of members

members.description: Select whether you want the marketing list to be static or dynamic. The members in a static marketing list are unchanging. A dynamic marketing list is based on a dynamic query that retrieves the updated list of members
